void InfoCoordinateReplyData::merge (  const InfoCoordinateReplyData &  data  ) 
 

Compares this object with the argument, and updates this object with the best of the two.

If the distance member variable is lower in the parameter object the data from that object will be copied into this object.

Parameters:
data The object to compare to and maybe copy from.

void InfoCoordinateReplyData::save (  Packet *  packet,
int &  pos
)  const
 

Stores this object in a packet.

pos The position to start writing at. Will be updated to point past the written data.
